title: Powerful magnetism & Non-verbal hypnosis for transformation / Dr. Paret's masterclass
description:
Dr. Marco Paret and one of his students from his non-verbal hypnosis masterclass demonstrate powerful magnetism and non-verbal hypnosis for transformation. Magnetism also known as Animal Magnetism is activation of the parasympathetic system, different from hypnosis. It leads to deep states and to non-local effects of clairvoyance. Magnetism is prana or chi the underlying energy or life force at work in the body during the healing process. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
